articles.title: Bolshoi Theatre's chief conductor quits after pressure to condemn Ukraine invasion - Reuters.com
articles.description: Tugan Sokhiev, the chief conductor at Moscow's prestigious Bolshoi Theatre, announced on Sunday he was quitting his job after coming under pressure to condemn the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
